page.title: 10Main Features Of Garston
page.content: *{Garston Market:}Most people come from other areas. Most of the market is inside. Some stallholders have had their stalls for 40 years. They say they do lot of business. Stalls sell things like food, clothing and toys. It is open on Tuesdays and Fridays. *{St. Michael's Parish Church:}There has been a church on this site since 1263. Today's building is 108 years old. It is Gothic in style. There are 3 services on Sunday. Extensive dry rot repairs have just been completed. Canon Robinson has served the community for 18 years. *{Railway:}A railway network has served Industrial Garston since 1830. The present suburban line was recently electrified and linked to Hunt's Cross. There are 3 trains each hour to Central Liverpool. L.FREEMAN L.GREGG C.HOWARD
